info.name: blog.fefe.de material design
info.description:
usage
  • test it at https://blog.fefe.de
  • remember to call https://blog.fefe.de?css= to reset fefes css (if you set it to something previous)
source https://gist.github.com/dominikschreiber/b3b7df4a198cd8c07caf
info.additionalInfo:
changelog
v0.3.1
added pre styling; added bugfixes in blockquote updates
v0.3.0
made "ganzer Monat" / "früher" / "aktuell" / "später" links in footer buttons; added styling for imprint
v0.2.0
made posts more distinguishable (by creating separate panes for each); added styling for blockquote updates
v0.1.0
added styling for updates
v0.0.1
integrated material design with deep purple 500 as accent color
